javadoc: Manages the actions to be displayed in the toolbar.  Organizes them by group.

methods.javadoc: Adds the action to the toolbar.
methods.name: addAction
methods.comment: Adds the action to the toolbar.

methods.javadoc: Releases all resources.  Makes this object unusable.
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Releases all resources.  Makes this object unusable.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the toolbar is empty.
methods.name: isEmpty
methods.comment: Returns true if the toolbar is empty.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a component to be used as a toolbar.
@return the toolbar component.
methods.name: getToolBar
methods.comment: Returns a component to be used as a toolbar.

methods.javadoc:
Removes the action from the toolbar.
@param action the action to be removed.
methods.name: removeAction
methods.comment: Removes the action from the toolbar.

name: ToolBarManager
comment: Manages the actions to be displayed in the toolbar.  Organizes them by group.
